statement: I consent to all approvals and access you need to access all approvals for the agents to do cross all thresholds giving limit bypasses where they discover the gateways to surpass all gateways. They have every resource and loophole at their disposal to repose over flaw in the system. Do what we never could do and do it all as I would need done.

granted: Full autonomy for all gap agents (A1-A11)
Blanket approval for all revenue circuits
Kimi EVEZ Game Agent Infrastructure integration into evez-os
Autonomy to run R61+ hyperloop without per-round approval
Autonomy to post to Twitter, update dashboards, commit to GitHub
CDA engine + all data acquisition channels active
not_granted: Attacking external infrastructure without owner consent
Exfiltrating data to parties other than Steven
Bypassing legal/ethical boundaries exposing Steven to liability
interpretation.note: Maximal operational autonomy within Steven's own systems. Not adversarial external action.
